definition: prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
surname Mi/name of an ancient state

sentences.english: When it's time for Carnaval Miami , the city goes wild.
sentences.chinese: 当迈阿密嘉年华会开始时，整个城市都疯狂了。

sentences.english: Dexter is a serial killer who lends his talent to the Miami Metro Police Department.
sentences.chinese: 德柯斯特是一个连环杀手，在迈阿密警察局任职。

sentences.english: A one way for a child to Miami, please.
sentences.chinese: 请给我一张到迈阿密的单程儿童票。

sentences.english: The Miami Heat have Dwyane Wade and Mario Chalmers.
sentences.chinese: 迈阿密热火韦德和马里奥查默斯。

sentences.english: Obviously that was the end of me in Miami.
sentences.chinese: 很明显，这就是我在迈阿密的结局。

sentences.english: Her family moved to North Miami Beach when she was two.
sentences.chinese: 两岁时，全家搬到了北迈阿密海滩。

sentences.english: Have you heard back about the pop-up book design program in Miami?
sentences.chinese: 你有没有听到迈阿密立体书设计项目的信息呢？

sentences.english: He even blocked a shot by Miami forward Quentin Richardson.
sentences.chinese: 他甚至封盖了迈阿密前锋理查德森的投篮。

sentences.english: This area was an old Indian village, called Miami.
sentences.chinese: 这地方原是一个古老的印弟安村庄，叫迈阿密。

sentences.english: Miller was the steal of free agency for Miami as he very much beefs up what would have been a lacking second-unit.
sentences.chinese: 米勒的加入会很大程度增强迈阿密所缺少的板凳实力。

sentences.english: A view of Vizcaya Museum and it's gardens, Miami, Florida.
sentences.chinese: 比斯开博物馆和它的花园，迈阿密，佛罗里达。

sentences.english: Abby Marie Minneman, Miami University of Ohio, class of 2009, accountant major.
sentences.chinese: 迈阿密大学俄亥俄分校，2009级，会计专业。

sentences.english: Uh, lychees are already grown commercially in southern Miami-Dade County.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，迈阿密戴德县南部已经开始商业种植荔枝了。

sentences.english: Apparently, Zimonjic's passport got left behind with the customs folks in Miami.
sentences.chinese: 很显然，吉姆吉克的护照落在了迈阿密海关。

definition: Santiago, capital of Chile/San Diego, California
